name: com.irsiksoftware.logsmith
description: A production-grade Unity logging package leveraging Unity's native logging system with advanced features for professional game development.

samples.description: Simple logging examples using the static API without dependency injection
Full dependency injection setup with VContainer including LifetimeScope configuration (automatically installs VContainer)
Example implementations showing how to create custom log sinks (HTTP, database, cloud)
Documentation and examples for customizing message formatting
Interactive demo scene with all LogSmith features and 7 example scripts
Visual debug overlay demonstration for Built-in Render Pipeline
Visual debug overlay demonstration for Universal Render Pipeline (requires URP package)
Visual debug overlay demonstration for High Definition Render Pipeline (requires HDRP package)
